item.title: A Taste of Istanbul’s Maritime Heritage: My Kumkapı Balık Pazarı Adventure;
item.description: Nestled along the Marmara Sea in the heart of Istanbul, the Kumkapı Balık Pazarı (Kumkapı Fish Market) is more than just a market—it’s a living testament to the city’s deep connection to the sea. For centuries, this vibrant neighborhood has been a hub for fishermen, merchants, and food lovers, offering some of the freshest seafood in the world. As someone who loves exploring culinary traditions, I couldn’t resist visiting this iconic market during my time in Istanbul.

item.title: Order your custom stickers today.
item.description: This is Nemah of NDesignstudio the author of this blog: Here is my today’s message: Elevate your brand, personalize your belongings, or add a unique touch to your gifts with our custom sticker prints! Designed with creativity and crafted with care, each sticker is printed at home using high-quality materials and meticulously hand-cut to ensure precision and attention to detail. Whether you’re looking to promote your business, express your individuality, or create something truly one-of-a-kind, our stickers are perfect for laptops, water bottles, notebooks, and more.

item.title: How to Create Design Brief for Design Project Made for Production;
item.description: In today’s post I will share with you how to create a design brief to participate in international competition held by an Italian university called Poli.Design; Save this post for future competition dates, specially if you are a design or industrial design student; The challenge of this competition was to design different types of chairs, interpreting values and identity of Porada, and the guidelines that will inspire the partecipants will be innovation, originality and search of new design solutions for woodworking.

item.title: Welcome to N Design Studyosu;
item.description: At NDesignStudio & Affiliate Partners, we work with you to optimize your business from the top down. As an award-winning design Studio, our group of professional engineers and social media content planners are always here to help your business get off the ground and grow. Meet Nemah;the founder of the Studio; she has a masters of marketing from Marmara University, Istanbul, Türkiye.Your Personal Branding and Design Expert; She is an experienced systems and network engineer and front-end designer with 7 years of experience.
